english: He tilted the car ( up ) to empty it .
The ship was listing badly but still kept afloat
chinese: 船倾侧得很厉害,但却仍然漂浮不沉

english: The boat heeled over in a strong wind
chinese: 船在强风吹袭下倾侧了。

english: The boat heeled over in the storm
Turn your head sideways , or lie down on your side , with your ear turned upward
chinese: 将头部倾侧或身体侧卧，耳朵向上。
倾侧造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: Her feeling of loneliness became more pronounced , and she felt tired
chinese: 她疲倦了。船身一倾侧，她那样坐着便感到吃力。

english: And i said , i see a seething pot ; and the face thereof is toward the north
chinese: 我说： “我看见一个沸腾的锅，锅口从北面向南倾侧。 ”

english: Keep your head turned sideways for about two minutes to prevent the medicine from running out
chinese: 保持头部倾侧约两分钟，以防止药水流出。

english: The helicopter then rested on the ground with the fuselage tilting to the left
chinese: 直升机在地面上停下，机身向左倾侧。直升机的左著陆橇严重损毁。

english: Hard to restrain , unstable is this mind ; it flits wherever it lists . good it is to control the mind . a controlled mind brings happiness
chinese: 思想很难约束、易变，只要一飞它就会倾侧。所以控制思想是好的；受控制的思想会带来快乐。

english: To generate electric charges . if you tilt the disk and slowly run your hands over it , the statically charged balls will organize themselves into branching patterns
chinese: 如果你将圆盘倾侧，并用手在上面缓缓扫过，带有静电的钢珠会形成分支的图案，就像木星及地球大气层中的闪电。

english: Static landscape to generate electric charges . if you tilt the disk and slowly run your hands over it , the statically charged balls will organize themselves into branching patterns
chinese: 如果你将圆盘倾侧，并用手在上面缓缓扫过，带有静电的钢珠会形成分支的图案，就像木星及地球大气层中的闪电。

english: He walked at the other s heels with a swing to his shoulders , and his legs spread unwittingly , as if the level floors were tilting up and sinking down to the heave and lunge of the sea
chinese: 他摇晃着肩膀跟在那人身后走着，两条腿不自觉地叉开，仿佛平坦的地板在随着波涛左右倾侧，上下颠簸，那宽阔的房间似乎装不下他那晃动的脚步。

english: The painting is delicate and vivid . a wind breezing over , the petals and leaves are lopsided . with float grasses waving , there seems to emanate a tangy scent of lotus . the thickness and texture of the petals are real to nature
chinese: 本图精致生动，画中一风吹来，花叶倾侧，水草飘动，若有莲香水味扑鼻；荷花花瓣的厚重、肌理和质感十足。
